column4: Traffic;Siem Reap: A bus driver who escaped for almost 4 months after a bus carrying Chinese tourists ------caused 3 deaths on 21/07/2019------ on the road to Kulen Mountain.------The suspect was taken in by Siem Reap Provincial Police
column5: in collaboration with Kampot Provincial Police following an arrest warrant issued by Siem Reap Provincial Court.------The accused is currently being detained and was sent to the provincial court for legal action. Further details are not yet known.------Source: Hout Sothy
